items.name: Naumi
items.text: I'm absolutely satisfied with everything. Of course, I wish the course were split into two separate ones‚Äîone for crypto and one for Forex‚Äîso you could focus on just Forex without spreading yourself too thin. Huge thanks to my curator, Oleg, who always explained everything clearly and in a timely manner. The training is worth the money and the knowledge gained. Thanks to the Cryptology team!

items.name: Arsen
items.text: I really enjoyed the training and I'm very happy that I found my calling where I can continue to grow. Of course, it's a bit scary, because you guided me along this path and now I'm on my own in front of the charts. All the knowledge and experience I gained came from you, and I'm grateful‚Äîit was incredibly valuable. I don't want to say goodbye, but that's how it is! Thank you so much once again!!!

items.name: Vlad
items.text: First of all, I'd like to thank the entire team for the knowledge they provided us with, especially Kobe‚Äîone love. From an organizational standpoint, I'd highlight how Telegram threads are managed, as well as the nearly 24/7 student support service‚Äîit's top-notch. Personally, I realized that my decision to join this training was one of the best in my life. Initially, I came here to earn money and gain freedom, but during the training itself, I realized that I found a passion I plan to pursue long term, along with a large community that keeps things fun.

items.name: @MKS@
items.text:
I haven't fully finished the course yet, but I can already say a few words about it. 
 First, a huge thanks to the manager who convinced me to purchase the training‚Äîthey are very good at selling. (All I originally wanted was to find out the course price üòÖ) 
 Secondly, the system for organizing the training and sending out any necessary notifications is extremely well set up. 
 I had experience studying in a different field before, but Cryptology‚Äôs approach is very organized and accessible. 
 About the team hosting the streams: you guys are awesome; everything was explained simply and clearly. 
 By the end of this part of the training, I realized how little I actually knew. I spent almost a year self-studying, yet in the first month of this course I learned more than I did in all that time on my own. 
 What I find most comfortable is that you can tackle the lessons anytime and submit your homework, which will be reviewed with feedback within a day. Since I combined it with my job‚Äîstudying mostly at night‚Äîthat was perfect. üëç 
 Many thanks to the entire team! ü§ù

items.name: Mark Upton
items.text: First of all, I'd like to thank the entire team for the knowledge they provided us with, especially Kobe‚Äîone love. From an organizational standpoint, I'd highlight how Telegram threads are managed, as well as the nearly 24/7 student support service‚Äîit's top-notch. Personally, I realized that my decision to join this training was one of the best in my life. Initially, I came here to earn money and gain freedom, but during the training itself, I realized that I found a passion I plan to pursue long term, along with a large community that keeps things fun.

items.name: Viktor L
items.text:
Hello. Thank you so much for this course and for all the knowledge. I want to thank each lecturer for the streams, where everything was broken down in detail, and also give a huge thanks to my curator for helping me through every confusing moment and promptly checking my homework. And a big thanks to all the curators, who provided feedback and assistance. 
 Special thanks to Golos za kadrom and Garry for their valuable advice, which helped me leave a toxic relationship and fully concentrate on my studies. Additional thanks to Nikita for the macroeconomics lessons‚Äîthis was the hardest subject for me, but I ended up really enjoying it. 
 These were an interesting three months, where we could chat with each other and offer tips. Competing in the leaderboard was exciting, and while I didn‚Äôt get a prize, that competition pushed me to be more responsible with the material and homework. I started to understand how it all works much better. Comparing my knowledge of trading and personal mindset before and after the course, the difference is massive. 
 I realize my journey is just beginning, but I recognized my emotional weaknesses during the tests on the course, and I know now what to work on. 
 It might not be easy at first, but you gave me the drive and determination not to give up. Thank you so much to the entire CRYPTOLOGY team for opening the door to a whole new world and giving me the knowledge in a field I hope to tie my future to. 
 See you on your other resources‚ù§Ô∏è

items.name: Dan
items.text: I can say with confidence that for anyone who wants to understand how asset markets work and eventually become a specialist, this school offers the best solution. Here, the material is presented in the simplest terms. Even those completely new to trading can easily understand everything, as they answer any questions right away. Plus, there‚Äôs a curator who checks your homework, explains, and helps you. The tools they teach do work; you just have to find your own style. Thanks a lot to the team for this training. If you‚Äôre on the fence about whether to enroll‚Äîdefinitely do it. ü§ù

items.name: –ï–ª–µ–Ω–∞ –ë–∞–ª–∞–±–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∞
items.text:
I'm satisfied with everything and excited to continue with the next packages. 
 A huge thanks to the lecturers: they explain everything clearly on the streams and break it down thoroughly. I'm a psychologist by education and by nature, and I came into trading as a complete beginner. Listening to all the terminology was like hearing another language‚ÄîI couldn‚Äôt grasp the meaning at all. Now, I hear and, more importantly, understand everything being said on streams, even those outside of the school. 
 My deepest gratitude! You are top-notch. üîù

items.name: Dmytro Kovalenko
items.text: Thanks to the team for the course! I was amazed by the professional approach to teaching: the intensive classes, the prepared video and text materials, homework and tests, live streams, and the support in chats‚Äîit's awesome! I recommend going for Proficiency or higher‚Äîthe additional knowledge on the stock market and more detailed trading approaches really pay off, at least for me. Special thanks to Madman for his dedication, hours of lessons, and especially the psychology-related topics. Extra thanks to golos za kadrom‚Äîafter your stream with Garry and Dtek-Trader, I reached out to the support team and all my questions about starting the program got resolved. P.S. The return on investment in this new (for me) direction of trading has dropped from an unknown infinity to actual, understandable timelines. I highly recommend it.

items.name: Pavel B
items.text:
Good afternoon!!! 
 I'm writing to express my heartfelt gratitude to the entire Cryptology team, and especially my mentor, Aleksa, for the priceless knowledge and support I received from the recent trading courses. 
 The comprehensive curriculum and expert guidance significantly improved my understanding of trading strategies, market analysis, and risk management. I truly appreciate the time and effort that you and your team invested in creating such an enriching educational experience. 
 The practical knowledge and hands-on training proved to be incredibly helpful, allowing me to apply theoretical concepts to real-life scenarios. I'm confident that the skills I've gained will be immensely beneficial in my future trading. 
 Once again, thank you for your dedication and commitment to providing top-notch education. I'm extremely grateful for the opportunity to learn from such professionals. 
 I‚Äôd like to highlight Aleksa as a TOP mentor who genuinely tried to share her experience and knowledge with us. She was basically available 24/7 for these three months. I can say it's thanks to her that I understood so much and started applying my newly acquired knowledge and her recommendations in intraday trading. I'm very glad I ended up in her group!!!

items.name: Anastasiia
items.text:
Many thanks to the Cryptology team for all the knowledge provided! The course stood out with the amount of material and the number of streams, which helped clarify any remaining questions. All information was presented in a very structured way, letting you accumulate knowledge from the basics to more advanced topics‚Äîso by the end, everything is neatly organized in your mind instead of being chaotic. Another plus is that different lecturers conducted backtests, so you get to see a variety of trading approaches. 
 I also want to point out the chat support team, which patiently answered a ton of questions, seemingly 24/7. Personally, the feedback from my curator in the platform chat was enough, but it‚Äôs great that there are multiple ways to get help. Thank you @foxe4 for always assisting me with any questions I had while doing homework. 
 This training is 100% worth every minute and every cent. I highly recommend it to anyone still hesitating!

items.name: Roma Kostiuk
items.text: The information is very useful and abundant. My teacher is Mado, I am very thankful to him for the helpful information and assistance in solving all the unclear questions! There is indeed a lot of information, it took me 3 months to grasp all the material, and another month or two for practice.

items.name: Artem V
items.text: Very good training. As you progress through the lessons, a cumulative effect starts to work. The material layers on top of each other, and a full understanding of the entire material begins to form. The mentors are very attentive and help with any unclear situation. This training will give you answers to the question of what real analysis is and how to work with it. Highly recommend!

items.name: Kisser
items.text: Good afternoon! I would like to thank Cryptology for the training. Special thanks to our mentor Mado for his patience and great delivery of information. During the training, my understanding of the market improved, even though this wasn‚Äôt my first training.

items.name: Diana Birgen
items.text:
I really enjoyed the training. I purchased the Supercharged package and I‚Äôm very happy with it. After 3 months, I already have a very broad and deep understanding of the trading profession. 
 I really enjoyed learning under the mentorship of our curator Mado. He is always very friendly and understanding. He explains the material in great detail and in a way that‚Äôs easy to understand. It was extremely comfortable and pleasant to learn. And most importantly, he knows how to encourage you in moments when you start losing hope about understanding the material. üòÖ 
 I‚Äôm very grateful to Mado for "guiding me by the hand" throughout the training. 
 I plan to continue learning at Cryptology. üôèüèªüëå

items.name: –Ø
items.text: The best approach and training, understanding, quality, and clear explanations. The best approach to students, full explanation of the material.

items.name: Dima
items.text:
I am extremely satisfied with the training at Cryptology School. 
 The journey was not easy, I spent it on homework and charts. 
 But I got the desired result ‚Äî I started live trading, which showed real trading, and during the training and trading process, it became clear what to work on. I personally became more disciplined, confident, and stress-resistant thanks to trading, and this is just the beginning. 
 Workshop, here I come!

items.name: Andrey
items.text: I wanted to understand the reason for price movement up or down, the logic ‚Äî and that‚Äôs exactly what I learned. Thank you for the course, I‚Äôm glad I took it!

items.name: Max
items.text:
Good afternoon! I just finished Supercharged 12 and didn‚Äôt expect it to be so deep and interesting!!! The knowledge base is simply superb (I have something to compare it to). A huge thank you to everyone for your hard work!!! 
 I want to thank our mentor Sasha for his patience and attention, as well as all the traders who led QA sessions and lectures. The main thing is to keep going and keep developing!!! After the training, I decided to go to the Workshop for sure. Thank you for the best training and the best traders; it‚Äôs a pleasure to absorb knowledge from them!!!

items.name: NB
items.text: Thank you very much for the training, you really opened my eyes to the crypto, forex, and index markets. Top-level training at a reasonable price, a lot of useful information and practice. Top teachers who explain clearly and concisely, no fluff!

items.name: NB
items.text:
This is the best educational product. 
 I haven‚Äôt found better training than yours (I have something to compare it to). 
 Thanks to the entire Cryptology Key team for spending your time on us. 
 After the training, I have a clear understanding of my next steps, and a better understanding of the market!
